channel.title: Youtube video.google and so on viedo download "for real!"
channel.description:
hey guys. i was surfing in the net when i found a link to this great site, that downloads videos from alot of sites i bet none of you heard of but also youtube.
[url=http://keepvid.com/]http://keepvid.com/[/url] go to youtube find the video u want start watching it or put on pause and then copy the url and paste it keepvid it will give you the normal url and the dl link done!
but you need a .flv player. u can get it for free on keepvid just press the big green play button and it will guide you to a site where u can get there latest .flv player.
DONE! enjoy your video. and if you need a converter [quote="Rictoo, post:2, topic:45988"][url=http://torrents.thepiratebay.org/hashtorrent/3413125.torrent/Xilisoft_Multimedia_Application_Pack.3413125.TPB.torrent]Xilisoft Multimedia Application Pack[/url] (use the 'Xilisoft iPod Video Converter' from the pack)
PS., You need a bittorrent client such as [url=http://www.bitcomet.com]BitComet[/url][/quote]
